title: #159: Gathering Up The Loose Change of 9/11 | Jason Bermas
description:
On the morning of September 11th, 2001, the entire world was impacted by the events that unfolded in New York City, Washington DC, and Shanksville, Pennsylvania. To say that the world changed that day would be an understatement, but most people had no idea just how massive and authoritarian those changes would end up actually being.

Jason Bermas found his calling in exposing the crimes committed that day by the Western governments that wanted the pretext to impose their diabolical plan on the world. He partnered up with Dylan Avery, the director of the original documentary “Loose Change”, in order to produce a second edition of the transformational movie to provide additional details, new storylines, and more footage of the events of that day.

If you woke up to the lies of 9/11 in the mid-2000s, “Loose Change” probably played a role in that awakening, and Jason Bermas continues to spread awareness through his show on Rokfin and with his additional documentaries, all available free of charge to anyone with the eyes to see it and the willingness to accept that things are not always as they appear to be.
